contents.text: Thank you for calling BlueJeans Network in South Bay, the most advanced video conferencing solution for your workplace or on the road.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To learn more about BlueJeans video conferencing features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our product specialists.

navigationGoals: Request a demo of advanced conferencing features
I’m interested in setting up a new BlueJeans account and learning about its core features, including any veteran discounts.
I need a detailed enterprise deployment overview and API integration demo for the BlueJeans platform.
I’d like someone to explain how your video conferencing service works and what features it offers.
Sign up for a new student account and arrange a demo of BlueJeans features for remote physics labs.

contents.text: For pricing details and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold to speak with our pricing and subscription team.

navigationGoals: Retrieve detailed subscription and pricing options
I’d like to review BlueJeans subscription plans and get detailed pricing information, especially for veterans.
I want a quote breakdown for an annual subscription covering 500 host licenses plus add-on services.
I need help understanding the subscription plans and pricing for BlueJeans.
Get pricing details on student subscription plans and ask about academic discounts.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
If you need technical assistance with your BlueJeans service, press 1.
Your call is important to us; please stay on the line for tech support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot video/audio issues in my BlueJeans meetings
I can’t connect to my VA telehealth appointment on BlueJeans and need help troubleshooting the connection.
I need help diagnosing end-to-end video latency via packet captures and adjusting QoS settings.
I’m having trouble connecting to my meeting and need technical help.
Fix audio and screen-sharing issues when broadcasting my physics simulations over BlueJeans.

contents.text: For billing or account management support, press 2.
We are connecting you to billing and account services; please hold.

navigationGoals: Update billing information on my BlueJeans account
I need to update my billing information and verify my subscription status for my BlueJeans service used for my veteran support group calls.
I want to update my billing cycle, add a new invoicing contact, and review usage reports.
I want to review my latest bill and update my payment information.
Update my billing information and review my most recent BlueJeans account charges.
